Text.Value: You walk the shadows safely. How?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: How did the shadow curse come to be?
Shepherding... the faithful... carrying... our Lady's light...
Always... many voices... hers... the LOUDEST...

EditorData.NodeContext: Even dead, the drider finds the pixie irritating - louder even than the voices in his head

Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Drider SpeakwithDead_Corpse Start, Loop, End. [PLAYER] HUM_M_Rig_DFLT_CINE_SpeakWithDead_Speaker_01_Start, Loop, End <OllieS>

Text.Value: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
How did you trap that pixie in the lantern?
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
